nodes.text: Tales of the Jedi is an audio drama released by HighBridge Audio written by John Whitman. It was an adaptation of Tales of the Jedi: Knights of the Old Republic and Tales of the Jedi: The Freedon Nadd Uprising.

"For over a thousand generations, the Jedi Knights were the most powerful, most respected force in the galaxy. . . The guardians of peace and justice in the Old Republic." With those words, Obi-Wan Kenobi hinted at the grand legend, the era of the Jedi Knights.
Follow the adventures of Ulic Qel-Droma and Nomi Sunrider, young Jedi Knights drawn into battle against the dark side, a battle that may decide the fate of the planet and the galaxy!
